title: PinMart Letter W Lapel Stick Pin
features: Available as a single item or bulk packed. Select your quantity above.

This Letter W (w) Stick Pin is gold plated, black enamel screen printed on a gold plated background. The oval Letter area is 7/8" long and 1/2" wide. From top of this pin to the bottom measures 3 inches.
A small safety tube attachment is included to protect your apparel from wear and tear, and keep it safely in place. It is packaged in an individual poly bag.
description: This Letter W (w) Stick Pin is gold plated, black enamel screen printed on a gold plated background. The oval Letter area is 7/8" long and 1/2" wide. From top of this pin to the bottom measures 3 inches. This pin is a symbolic and fun item to display your first or last initial or to display your child's initial proudly on a collar, lapel or lanyard. Perfect to give out as gifts or tokens of appreciation. This is also a thoughtful gift to give to each member of your bridal party or groomsmen to wear on their lapel. A small tube cover is included to protect and secure your stick pin in the perfect place. This is also a thoughtful gift to give to each member of your bridal party or groomsmen to wear on their lapel. Each is individually poly bagged.
